text: Alessandro Giannelli (born 9 August 1963) is an Italian former racing cyclist. He rode in three editions of the Tour de France, two editions of the Vuelta a España, and five editions of the Giro d'Italia. ==Major results== ;1991 : 2nd Coppa Bernocchi : 8th Tre Valli Varesine ;1992 : 1st Giro del Friuli : 1st Stage 4 Clásico RCN ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 1986 ! scope="col" | 1987 ! scope="col" | 1988 ! scope="col" | 1989 ! scope="col" | 1990 ! scope="col" | 1991 ! scope="col" | 1992 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia | style="text-align:center;"|DNF | style="text-align:center;"|42 | style="text- align:center;"|DNF |— |— | style="text-align:center;"|27 | style="text- align:center;"|71 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |— |— |— | style="text-align:center;"|69 | style="text-align:center;"|40 | style="text-align:center;"|DNF |- style="text- align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |— |— | style="text-align:center;"|DNF | style="text-align:center;"|67 |— |— |— |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Tuscany
